segments.text: I give up ! I simply can't learn French !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you say that ? I think you're making a lot of progress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm not . I try and try and I still can't speak it very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Learning any language takes a lot of effort . But don't give up . Why don't we practise those dialogues together ?
segments.speaker: S2
